[/quote]

ok 1 sec ill post a pic

and neither the gfx’s are working when i enter the thing it freezes my client

and i dont care about the yew tree models or anything i just need fix the boots and the ags and the gfx’s[/quote]

You need the emotes for the gfx, as for the boots and ags model, you are probably loading 508+ models for those, causing the glitches. Find the old models for ags and boots and pack those back to the cache.

}

public static Class36 method531(int j)
{

	int frame = Integer.parseInt(hex.substring((hex.length()-4)), 16);
